name: Home-Style Chicken Stew
description: Whether you’re seeking a quick weeknight solution or looking to dazzle guests, this hearty stew is your go-to recipe. You can also make it in the slow cooker or whip it up in an Instant Pot™. Plus, you can put those post-holiday turkey leftovers to scrumptious use by swapping them for chicken.
preparation:
1. In a bowl, combine seasoning with 2 cups water. Set aside.
  2. In a Multipurpose Steamer combine potatoes, carrots, and celery with 1⁄2 cup water. Cover and microwave on high for 8 min or until veggies are tender.
  3. Meanwhile, heat oil in large frying pan. Add chicken; stir-fry until golden and cooked through, 3–4 min.
  4. Stir in reserved seasoning mixture and cooked veggies. Bring to a boil, then stir in frozen peas. Cook until warmed through, 1 more min.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Enjoy 2 cups stew and serve with 1 1⁄2 cups veggies.
